entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
